attributes.action: Demand that £350 million pound per week be Ring-Fenced for our NHS as promised.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron and/or his successor must be held to this campaign promise and ensure that these funds are enshrined in law to benefit our National Health Service - failure to do so should make the Referendum 'null and void' on the grounds that millions of people were persuaded to vote 'leave' on an out and out LIE.
attributes.background:
The 'Leave' campaign promised the funds made available from leaving the EU would be paid to our NHS - this was plastered on 'battle buses' up and down the country and repeated in countless interviews and articles throughout the EU Referendum Campaign.
The Government must be held to that promise.
